category.catDesc: The author and recipient were not included by the FRUS editor/compiler as they were determined to be the same as those supplied in the parent chapter heading.
The author and recipient were not included by the FRUS editor/compiler as they were determined to be the same as those of the preceding document.

The printed volume did not include a header for the particular document, and none could be inferred from the parent chapter or preceding document. As a result, "[Untitled]" has been added as the header in the encoded version of the document.

body.p: This TEI document contains a taxonomy for use in analyzing FRUS head content.
